mapper.sql: id, course_code, code, type, title, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, optionE, single_answer, multiple_answer, yes_no_answer, score, create_time, modify_time, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from exam_questions
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_questions (id, course_code, code, type, title, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, optionE, single_answer, multiple_answer, yes_no_answer, score, create_time, modify_time, del_flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optiona,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{optionb,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{optionc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{optiond,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{optione,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{singleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{multipleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{yesNoAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update exam_questions
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
course_code = #{record.courseCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=CHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionA = #{record.optiona,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionB = #{record.optionb,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionC = #{record.optionc,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionD = #{record.optiond,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionE = #{record.optione,jdbcType=CHAR},
single_answer = #{record.singleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR},
multiple_answer = #{record.multipleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR},
yes_no_answer = #{record.yesNoAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR},
score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},

update exam_questions set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, course_code = #{record.courseCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionA = #{record.optiona,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionB = #{record.optionb,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionC = #{record.optionc,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionD = #{record.optiond,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionE = #{record.optione,jdbcType=CHAR}, single_answer = #{record.singleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, multiple_answer = #{record.multipleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, yes_no_answer = #{record.yesNoAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{record.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}

update exam_questions
course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optionA = #{optiona,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionB = #{optionb,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionC = #{optionc,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionD = #{optiond,jdbcType=CHAR},
optionE = #{optione,jdbcType=CHAR},
single_answer = #{singleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR},
multiple_answer = #{multipleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR},
yes_no_answer = #{yesNoAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_questions set course_code = #{courseCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optionA = #{optiona,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionB = #{optionb,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionC = #{optionc,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionD = #{optiond,jdbcType=CHAR}, optionE = #{optione,jdbcType=CHAR}, single_answer = #{singleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, multiple_answer = #{multipleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, yes_no_answer = #{yesNoAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select eq.id, eq.code, c.course_name courseName, eq.type, eq.title, eq.optionA, eq.optionB, eq.optionC, eq.optionD, eq.optionE, eq.single_answer singleAnswer, eq.multiple_answer multipleAnswer, eq.yes_no_answer yesNoAnswer, eq.score from exam_questions eq LEFT JOIN course c on eq.course_code = c.code where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into exam_questions (id, course_code, code, type, title, optionA, optionB, optionC, optionD, optionE, single_answer, multiple_answer, yes_no_answer, score, create_time, modify_time, del_flag) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.courseCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.optiona,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.optionb,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.optionc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.optiond,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.optione,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.singleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.multipleAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.yesNoAnswer,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select eq.id, eq.code, c.name courseName, eq.type, eq.title, eq.optionA, eq.optionB, eq.optionC, eq.optionD, eq.optionE, eq.single_answer singleAnswer, eq.multiple_answer multipleAnswer, eq.yes_no_answer yesNoAnswer, eq.score from exam_questions eq LEFT JOIN course c on eq.course_code = c.code
select count(1) from exam_questions eq LEFT JOIN course c on eq.course_code = c.code
